activities: Global traveler itineraries are provided by our clients to our servers that reside at the data center of Rackspace, our hosting provider. This data is then used to visualize locations using our mapping software and feedback is then sent back to our corporate clients and travelers. All data is outsourced to Rackspace with no data hosted at our Atlanta HQ. Our servers there are solely used for development.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: All persona data (name, mobile number, itinerary information) is processed by our outsource partner, Rackspace. This is automated data from our clients and does not include manually processed data.
recoursemech: Commitment to cooperate with EU data protection authorities and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner or their authorized representatives.
